concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 舒默（姓氏）

definitions.explanation_en: A surname, most notably associated with Charles Schumer, an American politician who has served as a U.S. Senator from New York since 1999 and as Senate Majority Leader from 2021 to 2025.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个姓氏，最著名的是查尔斯·舒默（Charles Schumer），自1999年起担任美国纽约州联邦参议员，并于2021年至2025年担任参议院多数党领袖。
definitions.example_en: Senator Schumer has been a leading voice on financial regulation and gun control legislation.
definitions.example_cn: 舒默参议员一直是金融监管和枪支控制立法方面的关键声音。
